item.title: A Glimpse of Happiness
item.author: mycaptainmy@gmail.com (Yuan Meng)
item.description: I loved it when you invited me in; you giggled when I tickled you and pretended to smother you with your beloved bed sheet. I examined your eyes, acne, and lips so closely, as if I was trying to register your everything in my brain. We chatted about how you got your orange-legged glasses in high school and put them on in a haste before morning meetings. So many little things that I never thought of or cared about suddenly mattered because of you.
